name: SwiftLuhn
summary: SwiftLuhn is a port of the Luhn algorithm, used for validating debit/credit card details.
description:
This is a port of the Luhn Algorithm, generally used for validating debit/credit card details, to Swift.

Objective-C port can be found at [https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/ObjectiveLuhn](https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/ObjectiveLuhn).
